description: Adds or updates the remediation configuration with a specific Config rule with the selected target or action. The API creates the RemediationConfiguration object for the Config rule. The Config rule must already exist for you to add a remediation configuration. The target (SSM document) must exist and have permissions to use the target.

nested_items.name: FailedBatches
nested_items.description: Returns a list of failed remediation batch objects.

nested_items.name: FailureMessage
nested_items.description: Returns a failure message. For example, the resource is already compliant.

nested_items.name: FailedItems
nested_items.description: Returns remediation configurations of the failed items.

nested_items.name: ConfigRuleName
nested_items.description: The name of the Config rule.

nested_items.name: TargetType
nested_items.description: The type of the target. Target executes remediation. For example, SSM document.

nested_items.name: TargetId
nested_items.description: Target ID is the name of the SSM document.

nested_items.name: TargetVersion
nested_items.description: Version of the target. For example, version of the SSM document.

nested_items.name: Parameters
nested_items.description: An object of the RemediationParameterValue.

nested_items.name: ResourceValue
nested_items.description: (string) ---

nested_items.name: ResourceValue
nested_items.description: The value is dynamic and changes at run-time.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: The value is a resource ID.

nested_items.name: StaticValue
nested_items.description: The value is static and does not change at run-time.

nested_items.name: Values
nested_items.description: A list of values. For example, the ARN of the assumed role.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: ResourceType
nested_items.description: The type of a resource.

nested_items.name: Automatic
nested_items.description: The remediation is triggered automatically.

nested_items.name: ExecutionControls
nested_items.description: An ExecutionControls object.

nested_items.name: SsmControls
nested_items.description: A SsmControls object.

nested_items.name: ConcurrentExecutionRatePercentage
nested_items.description: The maximum percentage of remediation actions allowed to run in parallel on the non-compliant resources for that specific rule. You can specify a percentage, such as 10%. The default value is 10.

nested_items.name: ErrorPercentage
nested_items.description: The percentage of errors that are allowed before SSM stops running automations on non-compliant resources for that specific rule. You can specify a percentage of errors, for example 10%. If you do not specifiy a percentage, the default is 50%. For example, if you set the ErrorPercentage to 40% for 10 non-compliant resources, then SSM stops running the automations when the fifth error is received.

nested_items.name: MaximumAutomaticAttempts
nested_items.description: The maximum number of failed attempts for auto-remediation. If you do not select a number, the default is 5.

nested_items.name: RetryAttemptSeconds
nested_items.description: Time window to determine whether or not to add a remediation exception to prevent infinite remediation attempts. If MaximumAutomaticAttempts remediation attempts have been made under RetryAttemptSeconds, a remediation exception will be added to the resource. If you do not select a number, the default is 60 seconds.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of remediation configuration.

nested_items.name: CreatedByService
nested_items.description: Name of the service that owns the service-linked rule, if applicable.
